thread.section_title: The Jewel facing Rockefeller Center - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic location, decent rooms
thread.title_full: Fantastic location, decent rooms - Review of The Jewel facing Rockefeller Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Joanna P
title: Fantastic location, decent rooms
text:
I stayed here with my mom for three nights at the beginning of March 2017. The location is perfect, we didn't ride the subway once. There are a lot of restaurants and sights within a few blocks. If you like The Today Show, it's only two blocks away. My mom and I were able to get there super early and she even got picked for the Ambush Makeover!
The rooms themselves were basic. There was only one drawer at the bottom of the closet and the room was very rectangular (oddly laid out). The bathroom door is a sliding door so it doesn't completely close and you can hear everything through the door. With those small downsides, I would still stay here again.
